information: It is very important to us that our ice-cream contains a high proportion of selected natural raw ingredients. Only the very best raw ingredients, of the highest possible quality, can guarantee the unique GEPPETTO taste. Our ice-cream is freshly produced using traditional, artisan methods. Connoisseurs and experts like our ice-cream because of its creamy freshness and sophisticated taste. This is because all our varieties of ice-cream are freshly produced, with the utmost care and accordingly to old recipes which have been handed down, in our production facility. You get fantastic-tasting quality! We make every effort to improve our standards and to exceed your expectations through continuous checks, including in the hygiene area.
